info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE MOHAVE COUNTY EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT. Fort Mojave Mesa Fire Station Number 92, 1 9 2 0 Camp Mohave Road, Mohave Valley. Sunrise Elementary School, 2 6 4 5 Landon Drive, Bullhead City. Mohave Valley Fire Station Number 81, 1 4 5 1 Willow Drive, Mohave Valley. American Red Cross Emergency Shelter, Colorado River High School, 2 2 5 0 Laguna Drive, Mohave Valley For Ice and Water.
